text: Philip Coggan is a British financial writer and news correspondent. He has written extensively for the weekly newspaper The Economist. He also worked for the Financial Times newspaper from 1986 to 2006. ==Biography== Philip Coggan was educated at the University of Cambridge. In 2006, he was named as the Journalist of the Year by the CFA Institute. ==References== Category:English journalists Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Philip Coggan
